title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: A responsive portfolio website showcasing my skills, projects, and contact information. Built with React, Tailwind CSS, and hosted on Netlify.

title: E-commerce Landing Page
description: A modern landing page for an e-commerce website. Designed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript with a focus on clean UI and optimized user experience.

title: Blog Web Application
description: A blog platform where users can view, create, and manage posts. Developed using React and Bootstrap with JSON-based mock backend.
